name: AI Crawling for ChatGPT, DeepSeek, and Claude
description:
This template allows you to scrape any website and send the extracted content to a Large Language Model (LLM) of your choice for further processing.

Use it to:

Analyze or summarize web pages

Extract structured data from e-commerce or news sites

Generate custom content or messaging from live data

Just provide the target URL(s) and a prompt for the LLM to guide its response. Perfect for automation, research, or building AI-powered workflows.
